Articles.Content:
A jet I made awhile ago, Rather fast, and super easy to control. Tell me in the comments what you think of it.

Pictures;

http://imgur.com/a/8EyyY#0

Download;

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ic33ote1s6iqozq/F-5.craft
I'm impressed. It goes fast enough to get the wind to appear around the craft AND it's easy to maneuver
That is very nice. What kind of payloads can I throw on it? But that would be the ultimate fighter. Too bad we don't have air-to-air missiles yet.

That is very nice. What kind of payloads can I throw on it? But that would be the ultimate fighter. Too bad we don't have air-to-air missiles yet.

Payloads... ...if you want to maintain the control of the craft, you would have to put the payload's centre of mass inline with the crafts, so keeping the centre of mass in the same spot the whole time. You'll also probably need to add more lift.
